import React from 'react' import '../style.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faTrash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import ReactTextCollapse from 'react-text-collapse' const TEXT_COLLAPSE_OPTIONS = { collapse: false, collapseText: '...show more', expandText: 'show less', minHeight: 70, maxHeight: 180, textStyle: { color: 'white', fontSize: '15px' } } const OfferCardComp = (props) => { return(
{ props.applications.map((item) => (

{item.company}

{item.title}

{item.desc}
))}
) } export default OfferCardComp
